requirements.title: Plugin architecture supporting dynamic loading

validation.notes: Plugin loading, unloading, and isolation tests

requirements.description: Database schema with JSONB for flexible graph data structures

validation.notes: Schema includes graphs, graph_versions, graph_conversions tables
